description:
Terra makes it easy to transfer health data.

The unified API makes it easy to access data from health apps, wearables, sensors, and medical equipment through one source

.co/_next/image?url=%2Fintegration_images%2Ffreestylelibre.webp&w=640&q=75)](http://tryterra.co/</integrations/freestylelibre>)[![eightsleep](http://tryterra.co/_next/image?url=%2Fintegration_images%2Feightsleep.webp&w=640&q=75)](http://tryterra.co/</integrations/eightsleep>)[![samsung](http://tryterra.co/_next/image?url=%2Fintegration_images%2Fsamsung.webp&w=640&q=75)](http://tryterra.co/</integrations/samsung>)[![tempo](http://tryterra.co/_next/image?url=%2Fintegration_images%2Ftempo.webp&w=640&q=75)](http://tryterra.co/</integrations/tempo>)[![ifit](http://tryterra.co/_next/image?url=%2Fintegration_images%2Fifit.webp&w=640&q=75)](http://tryterra.co/</integrations/ifit>)[](http://tryterra.co/</integrations>)
### Integrations
Health and fitness data for your users originates from multiple sources, such as Garmin, Fitbit and Oura, in a variety of forms. The Terra API standardizes health and fitness data, allowing you to use it structured and efficient manner, no matter the source.
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/</integrations>)
### Streaming
Stream real-time data from wearables, through BLE and ANT+. Connect to the SDK, and enable your users to connect their devices to your app and start streaming health data.
[Learn More](http://tryterra.co/</products/websockets>)
### Team Sports
Integrate with performance measurement devices like dynamometers, force plates, and body composition analyzers, plus in-game tracking for position, acceleration, and more. Our Team Sports API consolidates all metrics into one integration, allowing coaches to access and analyze data from any device.
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/<https:/dashboard.tryterra.co/user/signup>)
### AI Agents
Terra's AI agents, powered by our health & fitness API integrations, leverage real-time data from wearables to provide instant insights and perform actions. Fully customizable, these agents can be prompted to perform any task on your users' data, just like a personal coach would.
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/<https:/dashboard.tryterra.co/user/signup>)
### Health Scores
Terra Health Scores simplify complex health data into actionable, single-value metrics. Use health scores such as Sleep Score and Immune Index through our Dashboard and tailor them to your need. Scores are automatically calculated and delivered to you via the Terra API.
[Learn More](http://tryterra.co/</products/health-scores>)
### Health Rewards
Use Terra's Rewards to create engaging experiences by rewarding healthy behaviour. Configure points for various activities like activity, steps, sleep, and general health milestones. Simply configure your reward points in Terra’s dashboard, no code needed.
[Learn More](http://tryterra.co/</products/health-rewards>)
### Blood Reports
Get precise blood test data such as blood cell counts, Hba1c, biochemical markers, lipid profiles and many more into your app. 
[Learn More](http://tryterra.co/</products/blood-report-automation>)
### Workout Plans
Transform personalized workout plans into seamless experiences by pushing them to smart devices. Enable your users to receive real-time instructions based on heart rate, pace, or any metric, ensuring effortless adherence. Enable autopilot mode for your users’ workouts, enhancing their performance and removing the need to manually track their workout.
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/<https:/dashboard.tryterra.co/user/signup>)
### Data Generator
No device? No problem! Test our API without a wearable using our data generator. Simulate the output of any wearable device and experience the full data flow as if it were a real user. Build and test wearable integrations seamlessly, even without physical devices.
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/<https:/dashboard.tryterra.co/user/signup>)
### Graphs
Generate graphs from health & fitness data, and display them in your app using our Graph API. Simplify the process by asking ChatGPT to plot personalised graphs for you. For example, "Show me the last 10 days of HRV".
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/</products/graphapi>)
### Widget
Easily authenticate users in your app using our pre-built widget. Allow users to easily connect to over 90+ wearable providers in just a few simple steps.
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/<https:/dashboard.tryterra.co/user/signup>)
### More Destinations
Send your data straight to a variety of different destinations using our developers dashboard. Several locations are offered, from S3 buckets to Google Cloud Storage, and many more!
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/<https:/dashboard.tryterra.co/user/signup>)
### More Processes
Transform your data before it is sent to your app via our developer dashboard. We support the Terra Standard Format, Fit File and FHIR Format, with more formats on the way!
[Get Started](http://tryterra.co/<https:/dashboard.tryterra.co/user/signup>)

### Integrations
Health and fitness data for your users originates from multiple sources, such as Garmin, Fitbit and Oura, in a variety of forms. The Terra API standardizes health and fitness data, allowing you to use it structured and efficient manner, no matter the source.
Get Started⟨2⟩
### Streaming
Stream real-time data from wearables, through BLE and ANT+. Connect to the SDK, and enable your users to connect their devices to your app and start streaming health data.
Learn More⟨45⟩
### Team Sports
Integrate with performance measurement devices like dynamometers, force plates, and body composition analyzers, plus in-game tracking for position, acceleration, and more. Our Team Sports API consolidates all metrics into one integration, allowing coaches to access and analyze data from any device.
Get Started⟨23⟩
### AI Agents
Terra's AI agents, powered by our health & fitness API integrations, leverage real-time data from wearables to provide instant insights and perform actions. Fully customizable, these agents can be prompted to perform any task on your users' data, just like a personal coach would.
Get Started⟨23⟩
### Health Scores
Terra Health Scores simplify complex health data into actionable, single-value metrics. Use health scores such as Sleep Score and Immune Index through our Dashboard and tailor them to your need. Scores are automatically calculated and delivered to you via the Terra API.
Learn More⟨46⟩
### Health Rewards
Use Terra's Rewards to create engaging experiences by rewarding healthy behaviour. Configure points for various activities like activity, steps, sleep, and general health milestones. Simply configure your reward points in Terra’s dashboard, no code needed.
Learn More⟨47⟩
### Blood Reports
Get precise blood test data such as blood cell counts, Hba1c, biochemical markers, lipid profiles and many more into your app. 
Learn More⟨48⟩
### Workout Plans
Transform personalized workout plans into seamless experiences by pushing them to smart devices. Enable your users to receive real-time instructions based on heart rate, pace, or any metric, ensuring effortless adherence. Enable autopilot mode for your users’ workouts, enhancing their performance and removing the need to manually track their workout.
Get Started⟨23⟩
### Data Generator
No device? No problem! Test our API without a wearable using our data generator. Simulate the output of any wearable device and experience the full data flow as if it were a real user. Build and test wearable integrations seamlessly, even without physical devices.
Get Started⟨23⟩
### Graphs
Generate graphs from health & fitness data, and display them in your app using our Graph API. Simplify the process by asking ChatGPT to plot personalised graphs for you. For example, "Show me the last 10 days of HRV".
Get Started⟨49⟩
### Widget
Easily authenticate users in your app using our pre-built widget. Allow users to easily connect to over 90+ wearable providers in just a few simple steps.
Get Started⟨23⟩
### More Destinations
Send your data straight to a variety of different destinations using our developers dashboard. Several locations are offered, from S3 buckets to Google Cloud Storage, and many more!
Get Started⟨23⟩
### More Processes
Transform your data before it is sent to your app via our developer dashboard. We support the Terra Standard Format, Fit File and FHIR Format, with more formats on the way!
Get Started⟨23⟩

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Terra API**

Founded in 2020 and backed by Y Combinator in batch W21, Terra API has emerged as a versatile solution for developers looking to connect to health data from a variety of sources, including wearables, health apps, and medical devices. Headquartered in London, the company employs a team of 25 passionate individuals, all dedicated to improving how health data is shared and utilized for insights.

**Mission and Vision**

Terra API's core mission is straightforward: to simplify the transfer of health data. By providing a unified API, it enables developers to easily access information from various health applications and devices, creating a seamless integration experience. In a world where health data is scattered across multiple platforms, Terra API presents itself as a critical tool for efficient data management and insights generation.

**Features and Offerings**

Terra offers a wide range of products tailored for health data integration. Here’s a quick look at their key offerings:

- **Unified API**: Gather data from different health sources under a single umbrella.
- **SDK**: Software Development Kit to boost your integration capabilities.
- **Graph API**: Create personalized graphs visualizing health metrics.
- **Health Scores and Rewards**: Transform complex health data into actionable insights and engage users by rewarding healthy behaviors.
- **Blood Report API**: Access essential blood test data for deeper health analysis.
- **Streaming Capabilities**: Stream real-time data from wearables like Garmin and Fitbit, directly into your application.

Through these features, developers can create innovative applications that leverage real-time health data, incorporate AI, and foster user engagement.

**Community and Support**

At Terra API, community and support are highly prioritized. They offer extensive documentation, a vibrant community platform, and expert support to help developers navigate their integration journeys. Their resources include tutorials, a blog, and even a podcast featuring insights from health and fitness industry leaders.

**Security and Compliance**

Data security is paramount at Terra API. They ensure end-to-end encryption and maintain compliance with industry standards, including HIPAA and GDPR, providing users with peace of mind regarding their sensitive health data.

**Why Choose Terra API?**

If you're a developer looking to enter the health tech space or enhance your existing application, Terra API is poised to be your go-to partner. With a track record of rapid advancements, strong backing from the startup community, and a clear understanding of developers' needs, Terra API is solidifying its place at the forefront of digital health integration.

In essence, whether you're aiming to create an AI-driven health coach or simply need a reliable way to aggregate health data from wearable devices, Terra API provides a robust platform to get you there.

To learn more or get started, visit their website at [http://tryterra.co](http://tryterra.co).
